TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 代表可當成子項目集合容器使用的控制項。

span.span: Represents controls that act as containers for a collection of child elements.

summary.span: 此控制項的子系支援 ，且這些子系會組織成二維邏輯座標系統，供您依資料列及資料行來周遊。

span.span: The children of this control support and are organized in a two-dimensional logical coordinate system that can be traversed by row and column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不支援方格中，使用中的操作控制項模式都需要這項功能。 does not support active manipulation of a grid; the control pattern is required for this functionality. 請參閱[UI 自動化用戶端的控制項模式對應](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md)可能支援此控制項模式的控制項範例。See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) for examples of controls that may support this control pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cached As GridPattern.GridPatternInformation

summary.span: 取得這個 的快取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 結構，包含控制項模式的快取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取的屬性值必須已先前曾要求使用。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用取得屬性的目前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 如需可用的屬性和其使用資訊，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: 要求的屬性不在快取中。

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly ColumnCountProperty As AutomationProperty

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下列範例中，根項目會傳遞至函式傳回的使用者介面自動化項目子系的根目錄，且符合一組屬性條件的集合。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of UI Automation elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#100)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As GridPattern.GridPatternInformation

summary.span: 取得這個 的目前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 結構，包含控制項模式的目前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必須從與參考，以取得目前的值。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果使用取得、 它只快取資料，包含，並嘗試取得任何屬性的目前值引發例外狀況。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用取得先前使用指定之屬性的快取的值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 如需可用的屬性和其使用資訊，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement GetItem(int32 row, int32 column) cil managed
Public Function GetItem (row As Integer, column As Integer) As AutomationElement

span.span: The ordinal number of the row of interest.
The ordinal number of the column of interest.

summary.span: 擷取一個表示指定之儲存格的 。

span.span: Retrieves an that represents the specified cell.
An that represents the retrieved cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方格座標是以零為起始座標為 (0，0) 的左上角 （或為右上儲存格的地區設定）。Grid coordinates are zero-based with the upper left (or upper right cell depending on locale) having coordinates (0,0). 如果儲存格是空白的、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目仍會傳回以支援擷取為該資料格屬性。If a cell is empty, a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is still returned in order to support retrieval of the property for that cell. 在方格中的子元素的版面配置類似不完全陣列如下所示時，這是可行的。This is possible when the layout of child elements in the grid is similar to a ragged array as shown here. ![Windows 檔案總管 檢視顯示不完全的配置。] (~/add/media/uia-gridpattern-ragged-array.PNG "Windows 檔案總管 檢視顯示不完全的配置。")![Windows Explorer view showing ragged layout.](~/add/media/uia-gridpattern-ragged-array.PNG "Windows Explorer view showing ragged layout.") 座標是空的方格控制項範例Example of a Grid Control with Empty Coordinates ## Examples 在下列範例中，接聽程式會宣告為追蹤方格項目位於方格容器內的往返。In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of grid items within a grid container. 項目屬性會在每個焦點變更事件時，主控台回應。Item properties are echoed to the console upon each focus change event. [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#102)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

exception.span: 要求的資料列座標大於 或資料行座標大於 。

span.span: The requested row coordinate is larger than the or the column coordinate is larger than the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Pattern As AutomationPattern

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 例如，傳遞給方法的模式識別項擷取感興趣之控制項模式，從指定。The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自使用者介面自動化項目。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from a UI Automation element. [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly RowCountProperty As AutomationProperty

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下列範例中，根項目會傳遞至函式傳回的子系的根，而符合一組屬性條件的自動化項目集合。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of automation elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. 這個範例會擷取支援的使用者介面自動化項目但目前在樹狀目錄中有一個項目。This example retrieves the UI Automation elements that support but currently have only one item in the tree. [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#100)]
